Hoover.Ross Bridge Golf Resort and Spa: The Renaissance Ross Bridge Golf Resort and Spa is a 259-room resort, equipped with fine dining, a championship golf course, and a 12,000-square-foot (1,100 m2) full service spa. In addition there is approximately 25,000 square feet (2,300 m2) of indoor/outdoor meeting space. The hotel is managed by PCH Hotels and Resorts, Inc.
